messages.title: This election is close.
messages.content: Your vote will secure future progress or bring it to a screeching halt. Let's not waste the last five years of hard work and let Labour and the SNP take us back to square one.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We've already cut income tax for 26 million people – now we'll raise the 40p tax threshold so no-one earning less than £50,000 pays it.
We have halved the deficit as a share of our economy – now we'll keep running a surplus so that we start paying down our debts.
We've guaranteed that ISAs can be passed on to a spouse tax-free – now we'll take family homes out of Inheritance Tax by raising the effective threshold to £1 million.
We've protected spending on the NHS – now we'll spend at least an extra £8 billion to fund and support the NHS's own action plan.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If the Conservatives are able to hold seats like Hastings and Rye, they only need to win just 23 more for a majority government – and keep Ed Miliband and the SNP out of Downing Street.

issues.economy: We've halved the deficit as a share of our economy – now we'll keep running a surplus so that we start paying down our debts.
issues.governance: If you want a strong, stable and competent Conservative government – working to a clear economic plan.
issues.health: We've protected spending on the NHS – now we'll spend at least an extra £8 billion to fund and support the NHS's own action plan.

housing.content: We've guaranteed that ISAs can be passed on to a spouse tax-free – now we'll take family homes out of Inheritance Tax by raising the effective threshold to £1 million.

quotes.text: Don't risk it – for competence instead of chaos, vote Conservative.
